Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound #96 buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Foster
ShortDescription: Revised: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Lawrence and Ashland, due to street blockage near Damen/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Lawrence, and Ashland, due to street blockage near Damen/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th and #111A Pullman Shuttle Temporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/114th
ShortDescription: NB 115 Pullman/115th & 111A Pullman Shuttle buses are rrtd via 115th, Front, 114th, King Drive, then over normal route due to street blockage nr King Dr/114th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #115 Pullman/115th and #111A Pullman Shuttle buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Front, 114th, King Drive, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near King Drive/114th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
